verses.verse: ( Paul’s Greeting to the Galatians) Παῦλος <WG3972> Paulos Paul , ἀπόστολος <WG652> apostolos an apostle — οὐκ <WG3756> ouk [sent] not ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ from ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn men οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude nor δι’ <WG1223> di’ by ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou man , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but διὰ <WG1223> dia by Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ καὶ <WG2532> kai and Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros [the] Father , τοῦ <WG3588> tou who ἐγείραντος <WG1453> egeirantos raised αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him ἐκ <WG1537> ek from νεκρῶν <WG3498> nekrōn [the] dead —

καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi the σὺν <WG4862> syn with ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi me , πάντες <WG3956> pantes all ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers Ταῖς <WG3588> Tais To the ἐκκλησίαις <WG1577> ekklēsiais churches τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Γαλατίας <WG1053> Galatias of Galatia :

Χάρις <WG5485> Charis Grace ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἰρήνη <WG1515> eirēnē peace ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros Father ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our «καὶ <WG2532> kai and Κυρίου» <WG2962> Kyriou the Lord Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ , ( SBL, BYZ, and TR God the Father and our Lord Jesus Christ)

τοῦ <WG3588> tou who δόντος <WG1325> dontos gave ἑαυτὸν <WG1438> heauton Himself ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἁμαρτιῶν <WG266> hamartiōn sins ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our ὅπως <WG3704> hopōs to ἐξέληται <WG1807> exelētai rescue ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the αἰῶνος <WG165> aiōnos age , τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἐνεστῶτος <WG1764> enestōtos present πονηροῦ <WG4190> ponērou evil κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to τὸ <WG3588> to the θέλημα <WG2307> thelēma will τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God καὶ <WG2532> kai and Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros Father , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our

ᾧ <WG3739> hō to whom [be] ἡ <WG3588> hē - δόξα <WG1391> doxa glory εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τοὺς <WG3588> tous vvv αἰῶνας <WG165> aiōnas forever τῶν <WG3588> tōn [and] αἰώνων <WG165> aiōnōn ever . ἀμήν <WG281> amēn Amen .

( No Other Gospel) Θαυμάζω <WG2296> Thaumazō I am amazed ὅτι <WG3754> hoti vvv οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs how ταχέως <WG5030> tacheōs quickly μετατίθεσθε <WG3346> metatithesthe you are deserting ἀπὸ <WG575> apo - τοῦ <WG3588> tou the [One who] καλέσαντος <WG2564> kalesantos called ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ἐν <WG1722> en by χάριτι <WG5485> chariti [the] grace Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ εἰς <WG1519> eis [and are turning] to ἕτερον <WG2087> heteron a different εὐαγγέλιον <WG2098> euangelion gospel —

ὃ <WG3739> ho which οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not even ἔστιν <WG1510> estin is ἄλλο <WG243> allo [a gospel] . εἰ <WG1487> ei Evidently μή <WG3361> mē . . . τινές <WG5100> tines some εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are οἱ <WG3588> hoi [people] ταράσσοντες <WG5015> tarassontes troubling ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you καὶ <WG2532> kai and θέλοντες <WG2309> thelontes trying μεταστρέψαι <WG3344> metastrepsai to distort τὸ <WG3588> to the εὐαγγέλιον <WG2098> euangelion gospel τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ .

Ἀλλὰ <WG235> Alla But καὶ <WG2532> kai even ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis we ἢ <WG2228> ē or ἄγγελος <WG32> angelos an angel ἐξ <WG1537> ex from οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven εὐαγγελίζηται* <WG2097> euangelizētai should preach a gospel ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin . . . παρ’ <WG3844> par’ contrary to ὃ <WG3739> ho the one εὐηγγελισάμεθα <WG2097> euēngelisametha we preached ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you , ἀνάθεμα <WG331> anathema under a curse ! ἔστω <WG1510> estō let him be

ὡς <WG5613> hōs As προειρήκαμεν <WG4302> proeirēkamen we have said before , καὶ <WG2532> kai so ἄρτι <WG737> arti now πάλιν <WG3825> palin again : λέγω <WG3004> legō I say εἴ <WG1487> ei If τις <WG5100> tis anyone ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas . . . εὐαγγελίζεται <WG2097> euangelizetai is preaching to you a gospel παρ’ <WG3844> par’ contrary to ὃ <WG3739> ho the one παρελάβετε <WG3880> parelabete you received , ἀνάθεμα <WG331> anathema under a curse ! ἔστω <WG1510> estō let him be

( Paul Preaches the Gospel) Ἄρτι <WG737> Arti Am I now γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ἀνθρώπους <WG444> anthrōpous of men , πείθω <WG3982> peithō seeking the approval ἢ <WG2228> ē or τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon of God ? ἢ <WG2228> ē Or ζητῶ <WG2212> zētō am I striving ἀνθρώποις <WG444> anthrōpois men ? ἀρέσκειν <WG700> areskein to please εἰ <WG1487> ei If ἔτι <WG2089> eti . . . ἀνθρώποις <WG444> anthrōpois men , ἤρεσκον <WG700> ēreskon I were still trying to please Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ . δοῦλος <WG1401> doulos a servant οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἂν <WG302> an vvv ἤμην <WG1510> ēmēn I would not be

γνωρίζω <WG1107> gnōrizō I certify γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you , ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers , τὸ <WG3588> to [that] the εὐαγγέλιον <WG2098> euangelion gospel τὸ <WG3588> to - εὐαγγελισθὲν <WG2097> euangelisthen I preached ὑπ’ <WG5259> hyp’ . . . ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou . . . ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἔστιν <WG1510> estin was κατὰ <WG2596> kata devised by ἄνθρωπον <WG444> anthrōpon man . ( Literally not according to man)

οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude did not γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I παρὰ <WG3844> para from ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou any man , παρέλαβον <WG3880> parelabon receive αὐτό <WG846> auto it οὔτε <WG3777> oute nor ἐδιδάχθην <WG1321> edidachthēn was I taught [it] ; ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla rather, [ I received it ] δι’ <WG1223> di’ by ἀποκαλύψεως <WG602> apokalypseōs revelation Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou from Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ .

Ἠκούσατε <WG191> Ēkousate you have heard of γὰρ <WG1063> gar For τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἐμὴν <WG1699> emēn my ἀναστροφήν <WG391> anastrophēn way of life ποτε <WG4218> pote former ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - Ἰουδαϊσμῷ <WG2454> Ioudaismō Judaism , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti how καθ’ <WG2596> kath’ severely ὑπερβολὴν <WG5236> hyperbolēn . . . ἐδίωκον <WG1377> ediōkon I persecuted τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἐκκλησίαν <WG1577> ekklēsian church τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπόρθουν <WG4199> eporthoun tried to destroy αὐτήν <WG846> autēn it .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - προέκοπτον <WG4298> proekopton I was advancing ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - Ἰουδαϊσμῷ <WG2454> Ioudaismō Judaism ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper beyond πολλοὺς <WG4183> pollous many συνηλικιώτας <WG4915> synēlikiōtas of my contemporaries ἐν <WG1722> en . . . τῷ <WG3588> tō . . . γένει <WG1085> genei . . . μου <WG1473> mou . . . περισσοτέρως <WG4057> perissoterōs extremely ζηλωτὴς <WG2207> zēlōtēs zealous ὑπάρχων <WG5225> hyparchōn [and] was τῶν <WG3588> tōn for the πατρικῶν <WG3967> patrikōn fathers . μου <WG1473> mou of my παραδόσεων <WG3862> paradoseōn traditions

Ὅτε <WG3753> Hote when δὲ <WG1161> de But εὐδόκησεν <WG2106> eudokēsen was pleased [ὁ <WG3588> ho - θεὸς] <WG2316> theos God , ὁ <WG3588> ho who ἀφορίσας <WG873> aphorisas set me apart με <WG1473> me . . . ἐκ <WG1537> ek from κοιλίας <WG2836> koilias womb μητρός <WG3384> mētros mother’s μου <WG1473> mou my καὶ <WG2532> kai and καλέσας <WG2564> kalesas called [me] διὰ <WG1223> dia by τῆς <WG3588> tēs - χάριτος <WG5485> charitos grace , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

ἀποκαλύψαι <WG601> apokalypsai to reveal τὸν <WG3588> ton - Υἱὸν <WG5207> Huion Son αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ἐν <WG1722> en in ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi me ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that εὐαγγελίζωμαι <WG2097> euangelizōmai I might preach αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him ἐν <WG1722> en among τοῖς <WG3588> tois the ἔθνεσιν <WG1484> ethnesin Gentiles , εὐθέως <WG2112> eutheōs . . . οὐ <WG3756> ou . . . προσανεθέμην <WG4323> prosanethemēn I did not rush to consult σαρκὶ <WG4561> sarki with flesh καὶ <WG2532> kai and αἵματι <WG129> haimati blood ,

οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude nor ἀνῆλθον <WG424> anēlthon did I go up εἰς <WG1519> eis to Ἱεροσόλυμα <WG2414> Hierosolyma Jerusalem πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τοὺς <WG3588> tous the πρὸ <WG4253> pro [who came] before ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou me , ἀποστόλους <WG652> apostolous apostles ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but ἀπῆλθον <WG565> apēlthon I went εἰς <WG1519> eis into Ἀραβίαν <WG688> Arabian Arabia καὶ <WG2532> kai and πάλιν <WG3825> palin [later] ὑπέστρεψα <WG5290> hypestrepsa returned εἰς <WG1519> eis to Δαμασκόν <WG1154> Damaskon Damascus .

Ἔπειτα <WG1899> Epeita Only after μετὰ <WG3326> meta . . . τρία <WG5140> tria three ἔτη <WG2094> etē years ἀνῆλθον <WG424> anēlthon did I go up εἰς <WG1519> eis to Ἱεροσόλυμα <WG2414> Hierosolyma Jerusalem ἱστορῆσαι <WG2477> historēsai to confer with Κηφᾶν <WG2786> Kēphan Cephas , ( That is, Peter) καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπέμεινα <WG1961> epemeina I stayed πρὸς <WG4314> pros with αὐτὸν <WG846> auton him ἡμέρας <WG2250> hēmeras days . δεκαπέντε <WG1178> dekapente fifteen

ἕτερον <WG2087> heteron other δὲ <WG1161> de But τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the ἀποστόλων <WG652> apostolōn apostles οὐκ <WG3756> ouk none εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I saw εἰ <WG1487> ei except μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . Ἰάκωβον <WG2385> Iakōbon James , τὸν <WG3588> ton the ἀδελφὸν <WG80> adelphon brother . τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord’s

ἃ <WG3739> ha what δὲ <WG1161> de vvv γράφω <WG1125> graphō I am writing ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you ἰδοὺ <WG2400> idou I assure you ἐνώπιον <WG1799> enōpion before τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv ψεύδομαι <WG5574> pseudomai is no lie .

Ἔπειτα <WG1899> Epeita Later ἦλθον <WG2064> ēlthon I went εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὰ <WG3588> ta the κλίματα <WG2824> klimata regions τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Συρίας <WG4947> Syrias of Syria καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Κιλικίας <WG2791> Kilikias Cilicia .

ἤμην <WG1510> ēmēn I was δὲ <WG1161> de however , ἀγνοούμενος <WG50> agnooumenos unknown , τῷ <WG3588> tō - προσώπῳ <WG4383> prosōpō personally ταῖς <WG3588> tais to the ἐκκλησίαις <WG1577> ekklēsiais churches τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Ἰουδαίας <WG2449> Ioudaias of Judea ταῖς <WG3588> tais that [are] ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ .

μόνον <WG3440> monon only δὲ <WG1161> de - ἀκούοντες <WG191> akouontes heard ἦσαν <WG1510> ēsan They ὅτι <WG3754> hoti the account : Ὁ <WG3588> Ho “ The [man who] διώκων <WG1377> diōkōn persecuted ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us ποτε <WG4218> pote formerly νῦν <WG3568> nyn is now εὐαγγελίζεται <WG2097> euangelizetai preaching τὴν <WG3588> tēn the πίστιν <WG4102> pistin faith ἥν <WG3739> hēn - ποτε <WG4218> pote he once ἐπόρθει <WG4199> eporthei tried to destroy . ”
καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐδόξαζον <WG1392> edoxazon they glorified ἐν <WG1722> en because of ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi me . τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon God
